# **get_data_labeling_job**
> GetDataLabelingJobResponse get_data_labeling_job(authorization, job_id, accept_encoding=accept_encoding, content_encoding=content_encoding, zuora_entity_ids=zuora_entity_ids, zuora_track_id=zuora_track_id)

Retrieve a data labeling job

Retrieves a data labeling job. You can use this operation to track the status of the data labeling job.

* Bearer Authentication (bearerAuth):
